IDENTIFICACAO-DO-GRUPO.REPERCUSSOES: This group is highly multidisciplinary and the research spans from physics to clinical medicine. The main area is undestanding the pathology of atherosclerosis and the role of modified lipoproteins. Within the future goal is to develop diagnostics and vaccine. In addition we study the impact of medication in immunepathology of coronary diseases. The laboartory is associated to INCT-Fluidos Complex and member of INCT-INAMI. The quality of the group and its scientific penetrance can easily be evaluated by Curriculo Lattes.Myself as Lider has a Factor H =23 and around 3000 citations. Some of which have been cited during more than 25 years.

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: The focus is evaluation of lipid metabolism, immune responses and atherosclerosis progression in infectious diseases.

SETOR-DE-APLICACAO.SUBSETOR: Atividades de atenção à saúde humana

PESQUISADOR-LINHA.NOME-COMPLETO: Alice Maria Melville Paiva Della Libera
Maria Heloisa de Souza Lima Blotta

SETOR-DE-APLICACAO.SUBSETOR: Atividades de atenção à saúde humana

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Atherosclerosis is studied in a general manner and ranges from and includes physical properties of lipoproteins (i.e. HDL,LDL,VLDL) as well as biochemical properties. Clinical studies are performed on HIV patients and patients with periodontitis. Animal models are being developed.

PESQUISADOR-LINHA.NOME-COMPLETO: Alice Maria Melville Paiva Della Libera
Maria Heloisa de Souza Lima Blotta

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: The objective of this research is to evaluate the reationship between Oral staus and Cardiovascular risk. For this purpose cliniccal studies in humans are being perforemd and we are presently establishing a rat model.
analyse the impact of nutrition on the development of atherosclerosis

PESQUISADOR-LINHA.NOME-COMPLETO: Maria Heloisa de Souza Lima Blotta

SETOR-DE-APLICACAO.SUBSETOR: Atividades de atenção à saúde humana

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Analisar as funções biológicas das proteases, com ênfase especial ao processamento das lipoproteínas e possível papel nas doenças autoimunes, inclusive Artrite reumatóide, aterosclerose e lipodistrofia.
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Role of proteases in atherosclerosis diseases
